name: Super Seed Chocolate Protein Bars
description: Easy Super Seed chocolate Protein Bars. Vegan gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 Tbsp almond milk or other non dairy milk.
1/3 cup semi sweet chocolate chips or dark chocolate
2 Tbsp Hemp seeds  (or sunflower or almond meal or other seeds)
1/4 cup Sesame seeds (or use hemp seeds for more protein)
4 tbsp or more protein powder of choice (optional, add more seeds if omitting protein powder to get thicker bars)
For variations: Use spices like cinnamon (ginger, cloves, chili)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the coconut oil, maple and almond milk. Switch off heat once it starts to bubble.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat the coconut oil, maple and almond milk. Switch off heat once it starts to bubble.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chocolate and mix. Let sit for 2 minute and then whisk until melted and smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chocolate and mix. Let sit for 2 minute and then whisk until melted and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vanilla and salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vanilla and salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse the pumpkin, chia, flax and hemp in a blender to make a coarse meal.
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse the pumpkin, chia, flax and hemp in a blender to make a coarse meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the seed mixture and sesame seeds to the melted chocolate. Mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the seed mixture and sesame seeds to the melted chocolate. Mix to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Add protein powder if using and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add protein powder if using and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread on parchment using a spatula. Chill until set. slice and keep refrigerated for weeks.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread on parchment using a spatula. Chill until set. slice and keep refrigerated for weeks.
